getAdapter
 

Method Detail

getHistory

IHistory getHistory(ID partnerID,
                    java.util.Map options)
Get history for given partnerID.

Parameters:
partnerID - the ID of the partner we want history for. May not be null.
options - any options associated with getting history info. May be null.
Returns:
IHistory for given partnerID. Will return null if not history exists (with given options) for the given partnerID.

isActive

boolean isActive()
Returns:
true if history manager is active (recording history at all).

makeActive

void makeActive(boolean active,
                java.util.Map options)
Make this history manager active or inactive.

Parameters:
active - true to make this history manager active, false to make it inactive.
options - any options associated with the history manager being made active or inactive.
